actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit foreign pension plans to invest in the United States on a nontaxable basis for residential housing financing and investment purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income any income, gains, or other amounts derived by an eligible foreign pension plan from qualified investments in residential real property.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to permit foreign pension plans to invest in the United States on a nontaxable basis for residential housing financing and investment purposes.
